room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: Had a great time with Ethan and Neil ! Very friendly and fun !! I recommend doing the zombie room.  Loads of fun !!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: Thank you Ashley and Derek for a night of fun! :) Def would recommend to a friend and/or come back for more!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: Deanna and Hector were awesome. We had a fun (and terrifying) night out! Will definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: I really enjoyed this! Mary and Carlos were excellent and very helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: The 2 actor/actress were great at their roles and did help us out a little when we got stumped. They seemed to really enjoy what they were doing. The puzzle solving has many steps but is logical. Really fun!!! ...even though we did not survive!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: Highly recommend this (new to us) experience. It was a good time for all 4 of us. Well put together, super fun people running it. We all left with smiles.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: great way to spend an hour or so--puzzles were challenging for us but not impossible. Room is not very big, so with 8 other people theres a lot of jostling. and with people running and jumping to escape the zombie, this can be a physical game

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: OMG!!!! We had so fun!!! I went with my husband, his 2 sisters and their husbands. We were with 4 other people we didn't know...but that did not matter!! Once we got in that room and the door was locked.. BAM...IT WAS ON!!! We worked together solved the puzzles and if only...if only we had a few more seconds we would have escaped!!!!! We so cannot wait to do this again!! STILL EXCITED AND STILL REELING FROM THIS EXPERIENCE!!! A HUGE shout out to STACY AND MIKE for the awesome time!!! What a fun and grand date night to end our first ever WALKING DEAD DAY!!!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: Great actors, great puzzles. We survived! This was tons of fun. We would do it again. The summary of our performance, strengths and weaknesses for each member of the team, was terrific at the end. We haven't stopped talking about the puzzles and excitement of the whole thing.
